short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This handy plugin allows you to easily create an audio version of any text you select on a webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simply highlight the text, right click, and choose the Audio icon from the menu. Within 2-3 seconds an audio file will be generated that reads the selected text aloud. You can then download the audio file or delete it when finished. For privacy, all generated audio is automatically deleted at the end of each day. With the Read aloud plugin you can quickly turn online text into speech on demand. Give it a try for converting webpages to audio files with just a click!
